[h1]This game and the company behind it have no respect for you, your money, your time, your life.[/h1]

Blizzard pulled their payed game and released a free to play sequel, which as one of its primary selling points pre-launch, being that it has no lootboxes! (YAY, THEY TOTALLY WONT EXPLOIT US!) Instead it will feature a new (and unlegislated, uninvestigated) method of monetization, the battle pass! you can earn all the cosmetics you want! (if you play the game like a part time job and still pay for lots of the ""rarer"" cosmetics anyway) 

The battlepass is a system designed to prey on the nuerodivergent and addicted to squeeze them of their money and time in a way that will appear positive on spreadsheets given to shareholders & investors but may negatively effect the psyche of the players [Larche, C. J., Musielak, N., and Dixon, M. J. The Candy Crush Sweet Tooth: How â€˜near-missesâ€™ in Candy Crush increase frustration, and the urge to continue gameplay. Journal of gambling studies 33, 2 (2017), 599â€“615. Publisher: Springer.] as well as fostering elitism or the perception of elitism in the community [Petrovskaya, E., & Zendle, D. (2020). The battle pass: A mixed-methods investigation into a growing type of video game monetisation. OSF Preprints, Sep.], and generally being extremely annoying to deal with

Unfortunately the effects of the battlepass aren't currently well studied, but FoMO, or Fear of Missing Out, which is one of the primary selling points of battlepasses has been studied, and it has a direct relation as a mediating role to gaming addiction [Duman, H., & Ozkara, B. Y. (2021). The impact of social identity on online game addiction: the mediating role of the fear of missing out (FoMO) and the moderating role of the need to belong. Current Psychology, 40(9), 4571-4580.] (this article is unfortunately paywalled, however the abstract contains this information) 

In addition, the players who previously paid for overwatch 1 only got some extremely minor cosmetics (that had already been made for OW1 as the BASE models) and 3 heroes, but will also have to deal with the same F2P BS that players who got the game for free will deal with.

ALSO, part of the reason given for the switch to OW2 was that the engine needed tweaks to handle PVE, the main selling point of the game, WHICH WAS LATER COMPLETELY GUTTED, and will cost $15 USD to access, with it being confirmed there will be NO free way to access it [ Holt, K. (2023, June 20). Hereâ€™s why overwatch 2â€™s pve story missions paywall is causing some fans to quit the game. Forbes. https://www.forbes.com/sites/krisholt/2023/06/17/overwatch-2s-pve-story-missions-paywall-is-another-self-inflicted-body-blow/?sh=651d7cc95408 ]

ALSO ALSO, support has a reputation to hand out bans for things like fart jokes, while at the same time not banning players who use slurs with minor alterations to get past the automated filter

And there's EVEN MORE BS STUFF that I just don't have the time or energy to put into this already lengthy review, for example: 
Heroes cost around $10 each unless you want to grind for them on the aforementioned exploitative battlepass(with them being at such a ridiculous tier its obviously better to do a direct purchase, taking literal hours to unlock, being at an extremely high battlepass teir), 
the company behind the game is in an EXTREMELY BAD sexual harassment lawsuit (I would include this as a primary point but It would make the length of this review several pages longer),
many of the purchases are bundled so you don't get a clear idea of what they're worth, 
the credits you earn on the battlepass looking like the premium currency (they aren't),
the only way to earn heroes from past battlepasses for free being to grind for far more than 50 games, 
the generally toxic casual experience (this ties into that point about support not banning people for obvious rule breaking stuff like slurs), 
the use of "rarity" to justify absurd prices (upwards of $20 USD) of skins, despite there being no drop system in the game that has different drop rates
the use of a rotating store to prey on FoMO 
the company underpaying & firing its working staff for not earning enough profits growth (NOT earnings, PROFITS, they still made a profit, and that profit amount even grew, just not enough somehow!) while still giving their executives ludicrous salaries and raises every year
AND MORE!

Respect yourself, respect your time, respect your own money, don't even download this garbage for free, there are better options.
not enough barefoot/toeless shoes characters, can't really recommend.
